DOC.detailed_description: This study enrol participant diagnose breast cancer , lung cancer , colorectal cancer , leukemia multiple myeloma prostate cancer . PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To assess feasibility collect symptom data directly patient clinic visit via waiting-area computer . II . To preliminarily assess level agreement patient clinician Common Terminology Criteria Adverse Events ( CTCAE ) symptom severity scoring , measure whether score converge clinician expose patient self-reports . OUTLINE : Patients register Symptom Tracking Reporting ( STAR ) database , obtain password , undergo STAR training , complete patient-STAR questionnaire see clinician ( baseline self-report ) day 1 course 2* chemotherapy . Patients remind complete online STAR questionnaire see clinician day 1 course 3 , 4 , 5 , 6* chemotherapy . Clinicians review patient report create assessment . Patients also complete patient feedback survey day 1 course 4* chemotherapy . Clinicians complete feedback survey study completion .
